statements: SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE location = 'Main Street';
SELECT id, traffic_level, timestamp FROM traffic_data WHERE congestion_status = 'High';
SELECT location, congestion_status FROM traffic_data WHERE traffic_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, location, traffic_level, congestion_status FROM traffic_data WHERE congestion_status = 'Low' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE traffic_level > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, congestion_status FROM traffic_data WHERE traffic_level BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM traffic_data WHERE congestion_status = 'High' ORDER BY location ASC, timestamp;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE congestion_status = 'Low' AND location LIKE 'City%' ORDER BY traffic_level DESC;
SELECT id, traffic_level, congestion_status FROM traffic_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY traffic_level ASC, congestion_status DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM traffic_data WHERE congestion_level > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, congestion_level, timestamp FROM traffic_data WHERE location = 'City A' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, location, congestion_level FROM traffic_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM congestion_forecast WHERE forecast_timestamp >= '2022-08-01' ORDER BY forecasted_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE congestion_level > 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM traffic_data WHERE location='City Center' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY congestion_level ASC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) as total_records FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location HAVING total_records > 100 ORDER BY total_records DESC;

SELECT t.location, t.congestion_level, f.forecasted_level FROM traffic_data t INNER JOIN congestion_forecast f ON t.location = f.location WHERE t.congestion_level > f.forecasted_level ORDER BY t.timestamp ASC;
SELECT location, MAX(congestion_level) as max_congestion FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location ORDER BY max_congestion DESC;
SELECT * FROM congestion_data WHERE congestion_level > 2;
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM congestion_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras ORDER BY camera_id DESC;
SELECT location, status FROM traffic_cameras WHERE camera_type = 'speed';
SELECT * FROM road_segments WHERE road_type = 'highway' ORDER BY segment_id;
SELECT * FROM congestion_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM congestion_data WHERE congestion_level > 5 AND location = 'Downtown';
SELECT location, congestion_level, timestamp FROM congestion_data WHERE congestion_level BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT camera_id, location, camera_type FROM traffic_cameras WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT segment_id, start_location, end_location, road_type FROM road_segments WHERE road_type IN ('Highway', 'Main Road') ORDER BY segment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Lights;
SELECT id, location, last_updated FROM Traffic_Cameras;
SELECT location, camera_type FROM Traffic_Cameras ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT description FROM Traffic_Incidents WHERE incident_type='Accident';
SELECT pattern_name, traffic_volume, average_speed FROM Traffic_Patterns WHERE traffic_volume > 1000 ORDER BY average_speed ASC;
SELECT id, location FROM Traffic_Lights WHERE signal_status = 'Green' ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Cameras WHERE status = 'Operational' AND camera_type = 'PTZ' ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT id, pattern_name, traffic_volume, average_speed FROM Traffic_Patterns WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC
SELECT id, location, incident_type FROM Traffic_Incidents WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-12-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Lights tl JOIN Traffic_Cameras tc ON tl.location = tc.location WHERE tl.signal_status = 'Red' AND tc.status = 'Operational' ORDER BY tc.last_updated ASC
SELECT * FROM streets;
SELECT street_name, city_name, traffic_level FROM streets WHERE traffic_level > 3;
SELECT street_name, traffic_level FROM streets WHERE city_name = 'New York';
SELECT street_name, city_name FROM streets ORDER BY city_name DESC, street_name ASC;
SELECT street_name, city_name, traffic_level FROM streets WHERE city_name = 'Los Angeles' AND traffic_level < 2;
SELECT * FROM streets WHERE city_name = 'New York';
SELECT street_name, city_name FROM streets WHERE traffic_level > 3 ORDER BY street_name ASC;
SELECT camera_location, camera_status FROM traffic_cameras WHERE camera_status = 'active' ORDER BY camera_location DESC;

SELECT traffic_reports.report_date, traffic_reports.congestion_level, streets.street_name FROM traffic_reports JOIN traffic_cameras ON traffic_reports.camera_id = traffic_cameras.camera_id JOIN streets ON traffic_cameras.street_id = streets.street_id WHERE congestion_level >= 5 ORDER BY report_date DESC;

SELECT streets.street_name, traffic_predictions.prediction_date, traffic_predictions.predicted_congestion_level FROM traffic_predictions JOIN traffic_reports ON traffic_predictions.report_id = traffic_reports.report_id JOIN traffic_cameras ON traffic_reports.camera_id = traffic_cameras.camera_id JOIN streets ON traffic_cameras.street_id = streets.street_id WHERE predicted_congestion_level > 7 ORDER BY predicted_congestion_level DESC, prediction_date ASC;
